source_objects.title: Public Relations
source_objects.description: Learn how Public Relations can help growth your business with these coures on PR, media management for start-ups to established companies.

items.title: The Ultimate Public Relations Masterclass
items.headline: Everything you need to know to be successful at PR in a digital world
objectives_summary: How to build a PR strategy that generates leads, makes your brand famous, builds a community and attracts customers.
How to use PR to increase traffic to your website.
How to manage, implement and measure the success of your PR strategy.

items.title: Modern PR — How To Get Press Coverage For Your Business
items.headline: A proven public relations / PR system to get press coverage for your company or product, from a journalist's perspective
objectives_summary: Learn how to build and leverage relationships with journalists
Identify the reporters most likely to write about your business
Build a narrative around your brand and succinctly articulate your story

items.title: Public Relations: Media Crisis Communications
items.headline: Public Relations: You can shape and control your media messages at the worst possible times.
objectives_summary: Being able to Manage Crisis Communications
Know how to appear Confident on Camera
Prepare Messages

items.title: Presentation Skills: Give a Great New Business Pitch
items.headline: Presentation skills - You can make your prospects understand and remember your unique  value proposiiton
objectives_summary: Give a New Business Pitch
Get more new business
Avoid the most common blunders most people make in new business pitches

items.title: Press Coverage, Publicity & Public Relations For Branding

visible_instructors.job_title: Business, Entrepreneurship, SEO, Marketing, Amazon, YouTube
visible_instructors.name: Alex

items.headline: Public relations to reach 100,000+ potential clients with strategies to get publicity & press coverage for branding ASAP
objectives_summary: Get publicity for your business and get exposure to massive new audiences
Get on the radio, podcasts, online magazines, big blogs, and be promoted on big social media channels!!
Pitch journalists in effective ways that work

items.title: How To Write a Feature Article Story About Someone
items.headline: Learn the art of how to successfully interview & turn facts into a written feature story that your readers will love.
objectives_summary: Confidently conduct profile interviews with people
Know what type of questions to ask to get the most out of an interview / get your interviewee talking
Write a great feature story for any blog or other publication

items.title: Media Training Public Speaking Training for Candidates
items.headline: Media Training Public Speaking: political candidates can earn votes giving great campaign speeches and media interviews
objectives_summary: Create and deliver a stump speech
Hone your campaign messages
Speak to the media with confidence

items.title: Startup PR: Getting Press on a Tight Budget
items.headline: Tech journalist Erica Swallow shares her public relation strategies for getting press for your startup.
objectives_summary: In this course, you will learn how to perfect your startup's pitch and effectively communicate with the press.
By the end of the course, you will have the tools and knowledge needed to catch the attention of almost any journalist you're attempting to reach.

items.title: Copywriting Public Relations - master PR publicity skills

visible_instructors.title: Sean Kaye
visible_instructors.job_title: Enterprise Technologist and Online Marketing Expert
visible_instructors.name: Sean

items.headline: BECOME A PR PRO WORKING FROM HOME. ADD A NEW REVENUE STREAM or DRIVE YOUR BRAND, FAST.
objectives_summary: I promise that by the end of this course you will fully understand how to become a 'Voice in your Industry', Known and trusted by influential bloggers, freelance journalists and editors. Everything from developing a professional media plan to getting quality coverage, on-line and off.

items.title: Media and communication training. All bases covered.

items.headline: Presented by a 40 year media specialist. Covers everything you would learn in a live half day session workshop.
objectives_summary: To help the client improve their on camera performance
Help the client to get THEIR message across
Teach the client some media pitfalls

items.title: PowerPoint Presentations: Deliver a Non-Boring Presentation
items.headline: PowerPoint can be effective, when used properly. Learn the secrets now.
objectives_summary: Deliver PowerPoint presentations effectively
Avoid the common mistakes that make most PowerPoint speeches deadly dull
Rehearse PowerPoint Presentations on video

items.title: Startup Pitch: Pitch Venture Capital Investors for Startups
items.headline: Get startup venture capital in 72 hours: Startup pitching to get investors & venture capital -  (Startup Program)
objectives_summary: How to effectively pitch to investors
5 step startup-pitch program
How to persuade them of your idea, product or service

For personal branding, business marketing and corporate communications,
Lessons cover fundamentals and key message development, creating a positioning statement and biography,
